title: With You
description: She wants one night with the rock star. He wants forever.Rock star Jack McBride has a great life. He makes music with his three best friends, brothers really, gets to tour all over the world, and has more money than he’ll ever spend. He has everything a man could want. Except someone to share it with. His last girlfriend was more in love with his fame and what it could do for her than she was with him.Since she was seventeen, writing has helped Emily Prescott through her darkest days. Ten years later, she writes steamy romance to help readers escape from their lives. But when she catches her fiancé cheating just before their wedding, her reality crashes and writing eludes her. She’s stuck in her own broken life.Her best friend drags her to a concert, and when Jack sees her in the crowd, he invites her backstage.Emily can’t deny her attraction to Jack. He’s nice, thoughtful, and genuine. But she’s not looking to get involved, so she offers him one night to explore the lust raging between them. In the morning, she’s leaving.Having all Jack’s considerable attention for the night was just the break she needed.But she has a secret no amount of sexual chemistry will get her to reveal…With You, book 1 in Jack and Emily's trilogy, features a determined, overprotective hero who doesn’t know the meaning of the word quit and a stubborn, fiercely independent heroine who thinks she has to handle everything alone.Jack and Emily's story continues in No More Yesterdays and All Your Tomorrows.Steam Level: IncendiarySuspense: Nerve-wrackingFeels: All of themTissues: Tears of joy, laughter, and ugly cryingHEA: Work in progress
author: Jessica Marlowe
